|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F2G08U0B-PCB0; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6JB-25; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C4:3D:C7
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.14; |stockos = Linux;2.6.22.18-Netgear;Axentra HipServ OS;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1), J2 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Showcase digital photos, movies and files anywhere, for anyone *Experience smooth, jitter-free music and video streaming for multiple users *Access files and play or view content at home and over the Internet *Add a second disk drive for data mirroring in seconds
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.ixbt.com/storage/storage-netgear-stora.shtml ''Netgear Stora MS2110'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) *[https://www.ferra.ru/review/computers/101585.htm ''Netgear Stora MS2110'' on '''Ferra'''] (RU) :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6-B1A2 @1GHz (Feroceon) :Flash: [[Samsung]] K9F2G08U0B-PCB0 (256MB) :RAM: [[Samsung]] K4T51163QG-HCE7 (2x 128MB) :HDD: ''Seagate'' Barracuda ST31000520AS (1TB) <!-- LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E1116R -->
